- adding ModPerl::BuildMM, which is now used for building mod_perl.

author: stas
msg: drop the glue code for apr_generate_random_bytes, since it's not
available on all platforms. (only if APR_HAS_RANDOM is defined)

author: stas
msg: fix the test to work with Apache versions that end up splitting the
request body in a different number of bbs, so we can't test the number.
